question: A friend has written to you asking for advice about a problem at work. You have had a similar problem in the past.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:tell your friend you understand the problemexplain what happened to you in the pastsuggest a possible solution to this problem.
text: Hope this finds you well. It was so nice to hear from you after a long time. I have noticed, that you are seeking some advice for some technical issues that you are currently facing.
I had a similar sort of issue when I was working at your division, working through the VPN makes troubles more often. So, I understand what you are going through right now.

I got stuck at times  when I was transferring base station traffic from one node to another. It is quite hard to explain how I felt on those occasions. I had to work overnights because of this issue that we have in our network.

Luckily, I found a solution for this issue after a few months of experiments. I changed my dongle into an XPN brand. It worked smoothly and there were no disconnections. That is how I ended my nightmare. I hope it will work for you as well.
Let me stop here, if you need further information, please feel free to call me on my mobile number.
